content: $AAPL looking bullish for next week, expecting breakout above $190. Strong buy signal on the daily chart. $TSLA on the other hand showing weakness, might be time to buy 170P 05/17.

insights.summary: AAPL appears bullish with expectations of a breakout above $190, supported by strong buy signals on the daily chart.
TSLA shows signs of weakness, suggesting a potential decline. An option trade for buying puts is indicated.
